## Connect.commitEvent() method

Sends a request to the server to retrieve data or perform an action.

**Signature:**

```typescript
commitEvent(eventName: string, params?: CommitParams): Promise<Message>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventName | string |  |
|  params | [CommitParams](./foundation-comms.commitparams.md) | _(Optional)_ An object containing optional parameters to include in the request. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Message](./foundation-comms.message.md)&gt;

A promise that resolves to a Message containing the server's response.
